item.title: 【Helpdesk】stop posting .wav / h264 when theres flac and hevc option
item.description:
dear everyone in the video mania posting mvs masters AND THE SONG STEMS STOP USING WAV when theres lossless option. is it hard to encode flac or decode? NO, not hevc is hard either. cloud drives are expensive internet is expensive WHY DONT SAVE SPACES AND MONEY WHEN YOU CAN like i just don't get it and WAV should no longer be a gimmick AND h26
4 should be out of style
item.author: faosijio
